author: Shoumojit Banerjee
text: Lending his support to journalism students of Pune University, JNU Students’ Union leader Kanhaiya Kumar on Monday said he was determined to accept the invite to speak there. “I am firm in my endeavour in supporting students wherever they are fighting… I fully back the fight of the students of Fergusson College and the journalism students of Pune University against the forces of tyranny,” said Mr. Kumar, speaking on the phone from Delhi.
title: Kanhaiya firm on visiting Pune
